about_the_game:
THE MAZYVERSE

Explore the Mazyverse, a land brimming with adventure, warm encounters, and strange mazes. As one of the last trained maze navigators, you'll search for lost objects, unravel long-lost secrets, and restore a ruined town. Oh, and talk to the cows.

A TOWN IN NEED

A cozy little town has been turned upside down by a devastating storm, leaving the poor inhabitants in quite a predicament. Their beloved possessions are scattered all over the place, tucked away in the twists and turns of the surrounding mazes. As one of the last skilled maze navigators, it's up to you to lend a helping hand.

MASTER THE MAZES

Wander through mazes filled with quirky characters and charming critters. Chat with the animals you meet along the way—they might help you on a quest or simply need a good laugh. Each maze is a new puzzle to solve, a new story to uncover, and a new friend to make.

REBUILD WITH CREATIVITY

With every mission you complete, you'll gather pieces to help rebuild the town. This is where your creativity shines—design and personalize each building, garden, and street corner to create a unique and heartwarming community. Every town will be one-of-a-kind, restoring the town to its former charm.

  • Explore a wonderful world of cozy forests, sprawling ruins, and sparkling snowlands.
  • Challenge pesky hobbyist mazographers to prove you master the mazes.
  • Collect the missing objects, unlocking stories and secrets—lots of secrets.
  • Customize and decorate your town however you like!
  • Discover little animal friends to help you on your way.
